item.title: DSL woes
item.description: Well, it turns out that in my new house I can only get 256kbs up and 256kbs down.  In the old place I was getting 640kbs up and 256kbs down.  I guess I'm just too far from the CO.  My choices are to (a) suck it up, (b) go with a cable modem and their onerous terms of service or (c) shell out big bucks for a business class line.  So far (a) is looking good but I'm not happy about it.

item.title: New House!
item.description:
Well, I'm moved in to my new house.  The DSL is hooked up and we are starting to unpack.

I need to change the ICBM coords for geourl, along with 10 thousand other things to do when starting out in a new house!
